game.name: Romantic Pursuit
game.description:
One of the unique and fresh running game as offered in the series of adventure games online is romantic pursuit that is for the love birds that don?t desist from show casing their love and to go any extent to win over the faith of your beloved. A free fun adventure online game may even tell how to win over the heart of your beloved.

In this particular online adventure games category of running games you can help love fanatic horse by guiding him to woo the heart of his paramour. The winged horse that is depressed and dejected after the refusal from princess, need, immense help and assistance from you to prove his deep desire and sense through the stages of this adventure game for boys and upcoming teens.

You aids to the flying horse with the control of love in a wonderland to collect magical power. By jumping across the cliffs and mountains in this amazing adventure game as heading forward results into the collection of reasonable powers to kill the demonic creatures and obstructions on the path love thirsty horse.

The controls in this adventure game online are simple as pressing the Z will help the horse to jump over the cliff, however, don?t miss to double click the mouse otherwise the horse will die with a desire of last longing wish of love. Opps! You missed the double click, yet you have two lifelines to help the horse to live his love cause. And X is the key to take on enemies in this fun filled adventure games online.
